title: Good, but.....
text: App & cameras are decent; my only request is to make an update that allows me to turn off notifications within the app. I do not care about notifications when someone moves in front of the camera. I‚Äôve got 4 kids & 4 animals in my house; I would think that feature should be optional

title: Re-review
text: I reviewed this app and their associated hardware at a 1 star rating about 6 months ago. The company replaced one faulty camera and after the firmware patch I feel a 5 star rating is warranted.  I no longer have connectivity issues and if I reset my WiFi network the cameras automatically recognize and reconnect to the network. This company has made significant improvements to their product and if you were frustrated like I was and moved away from them, I‚Äôd try it out again and see that there is real value at this price. My only criticism is that I wish they had a viable battery operated camera that could compete with other fully wireless cameras like arlo.

title: Horrible company
text: I have the CHS1AWACS model WiFi camera and this specific camera does not support motion detection. It does not support push notifications. It does not support video recording. It has a memory card slot but it does not support memory card. Are you kidding me? What am I wasting my money on?? All I can do is view live and that‚Äôs it. DO NOT ask me to email you for further assistance, you already gave me assistance and this is what the results are! This company has converted all their cameras and systems to run on cloud service to make more money. Horrible app, horrible cameras, horrible company! This camera is still being sold everywhere and it doesn‚Äôt even work! This is just sad. 1 star.  Tomorrow I am returning these cameras. I am not going to purchase your updated ‚Äúcloud‚Äù cameras as a solution. Good bye!! üëã

title: Seems things have changed
text: This app/camera was decent enough. It did what it needed to do. But I‚Äôve noticed I‚Äôm not getting alerts even though I know there is movement. My settings haven‚Äôt changed.  One day all my videos were there and then gone the next. Now it seems it only keeps videos for two days. Some days features won‚Äôt load even if I‚Äôm on WiFi. Had to re set up my camera. My phone and camera had to be sitting on top of the router for it to all connect. Was thinking of getting a second camera- but might go with a different company.

title: Good update
text:
I like the update but what devices work with lighting and the other options. For those who are complaining try updating the firmware on the devices and checking your device setting along with settings under the different modes I.e. AWAY,HOME,SLEEP,  etc...There are a lot of new features such as better sound and longer video clips. 

I would opt out of the cloud service. A little pricey for the service for one camera. I have a lot of cameras indoor and outdoor and it does not pay to do this

title: We‚Äôve had nothing but problems
text: There seems to always be a problem with the system. Less than six months after we purchased the product, we started having unexplained issues with the system and cameras. At first, two of the four cameras went out and the company sent us replacements. Then two others went out but we were out of warranty. Now only one of the four cameras is working. As was mentioned on another review, many times I‚Äôm right here at home watching from the window, movements that the camera should pick up but it doesn‚Äôt. Not good nor reliable system at all.

title: Do Not Update. Delete phone app. Reinstall new copy from App Store
text: It seems like recent update was more than just bug fixes. The whole app looks redesigned. As the title states, (1) delete app, (2) reinstall new copy of app and (3) login with original info. This has worked for me. I‚Äôm back online viewing cameras. Hope this helps. Minus a star to developer for not providing clear description of the update and step-by-step instructions.

title: Functional app but not perfect
text:
App works. Alerts work. I like the fact that playback has an orange mark showing where activity was. 

Things I wish it had: 
Cheaper or better playback storage option. Wishlist item. 

-actual things that can be easily changed, be able to see live feeds or 2 and 4 cameras at once. Just split screen or 4 way the screen. Right now you can only watch one at a time. 

-be able to fast forward playback. Yes it has an activity mark, but I‚Äôd rather be able to scroll through a 4 hour window by fast forwarding. 2x, 4x 10x fast forward. Those two main items would make this a much better experience. I understand playback storage can be charged for it‚Äôs just that some other camera companies don‚Äôt charge for that and not necessarily the apps fault more so the camera. So mostly the watch 4 at once and fast forward feedback

title: Absolutely the worse app ever
text: Always having trouble with the app but could work around the issues. Until yesterday all of my cameras have disappeared from the app and it doesn‚Äôt want to recognize any of the 9 I had hooked up. It‚Äôs not the WiFi it‚Äôs not the camera it‚Äôs the app. Looks like they updated the app but in reality they made it in-op nothing works...they don‚Äôt answer the phone you can‚Äôt leave a message and the in app support is never there...it‚Äôs a joke completely a joke. Don‚Äôt buy their cameras and whatever you do don‚Äôt download the app it‚Äôs a complete waste of time!!

title: Seems good
text: I see all the bad reviews but after I connected the internet to the (1) camera- the image is pretty good. It catches the action that my pets make so I‚Äôm assuming it will work for what it‚Äôs intended for. The update issue that everyone is complaining about must be fixed. I operate this from and iPhone 7. Again I only have one camera so that might limit the issues. But I‚Äôm pleased with it so far.

title: Useful for me...
text: I love these cameras, because I can see just what is happening around, anywhere! But sometimes I get alerts in like 30 minutes. I don't really like that because say if somebody was in my house, but I would have known that in 30 minutes, so if I would probably get the alerts in at least a minute or less it would just make it so better for me and my family.

title: App is a pile of garbage
text:
Here are the limitations and bugs you can be sure you will encounter with this app

1. For some reason, it locks at 6am constantly for me when trying to review past recordings. 

2.  It will only consistently show recorded video up until the previous hour.  So if you‚Äôre looking for a recording from 10:30 and it‚Äôs currently 10:35, odds are you can‚Äôt see the footage you want until after 11. 

Any interruption kicks you out of the video you‚Äôre looking at, meaning you need to roll the dice and try and get it working again. 

For some reason, if you reload the past footage 20 times or so, eventually you can get to the footage after the typical break per hour.  So in the example above, if I really needed to see the 10:35 footage, reloading the camera two dozens times will  eventually load the footage from the last hour until the current time.

title: Seems to work good...
text: I was expecting for it to be bad from the other reviews, but I don‚Äôt see many problems with it, a few bugs here and there. Customer support is very helpful and viewing our cameras is relatively easy. Cloud service seems to be working good.

title: won‚Äôt connect
text: Been having cameras since 2017. Recently updated WiFi password so had to delete and reconnect all my cameras which is stupid. You should be able to just go into the settings and update password. Anyway, been trying for hours to reconnect. Tried Zink and QRC and both won‚Äôt work. I have 5 cameras and I‚Äôm at the point of just canceling subscription and getting different cameras. Firmware was updated prior to WiFi password change.

title: Garbage app
text: This app worked great for the first few months. I got these cameras in 2017. Then features suddenly stopped working. Local playback doesn‚Äôt work any longer. It keeps prompting me to pay for cloud storage. Local playback and cloud storage are not the same. Defeats the entire purpose of having security if you cant review footage. Thanks Funlux The man in my back yard got away and the footage is inaccessible I will never purchase another product from this company.

title: Started out great...
text: So I used these cameras & app for 6 months with no issues. But as soon as I moved & had to change the WiFi modem & password they haven‚Äôt worked since! Ugh why do they make it so difficult to update the WiFi info to the app/cameras? I just tried to delete them all & start fresh but they did an update on the app so now the camera has to scan a barcode... yeah it just plain out doesn‚Äôt work! Fix the issues Funlux & I‚Äôll change my rating.

title: Please help
text: Does not support multi channel viewing. This is the ONLY downfall but is very useless to buy a thousand dollar system and wire 8 cameras to only be able to view one camera in total? Where is the security in that? I don‚Äôt feel like my family is safe if I am unable to check on them while away! Very upset with new version. It‚Äôs not safe to download old version so what can I do? I questioning should I switch to Swann Advanced Security Made EASY? Can I get some help

title: Can‚Äôt login
text: Ever since the update, the camera has been glitching out and now I can‚Äôt even login to my account!  It keeps saying ‚ÄúRequest Failure‚Äù.  I‚Äôve tried changing my password three times, and deleted and redownloaded the app. Nothing is working. I use this app to keep an eye on my cats while I‚Äôm at work.  I also pay the monthly fee for the cloud and constant recording. This needs to be fixed!!!!!

title: Wish they had a location feature
text: It would be nice if the away and Home feature could automatically turn on and off when I leave and arrive home

title: No many options.
text:
A have used this system foa a year with some  issues, but as soon changed internet provider (for a better one, and $250 router) set it up again was impossible mission. Cameras don‚Äùt connect again with recorder device. Update is worst.  I‚Äôm very close to get it in my trash can. 
         
    Updated, cams and system already in the trash. Never works again.

title: Update is Broken
text: Previous version works well in my iPhone, but auto update to new version in wife's phone and a download to iPad don't work!  CH1=CH3, No alerts, can't slide view from one camera to next.  Now, it Only displays funlux default images, and must go back to select different channel  from the new channel page GUI. There is no excuse for an update to break the fundamental system requirements of a security system.

title: Connectivity is horrible
text: I have two cameras both show the solid blue light one works one never stays online. I‚Äôve had the internet company out here I‚Äôve got plenty of power for these cameras I‚Äôm in a situation where I need my cameras to work for domestic issues and they don‚Äôt. I try support and only get automated responses wish they would replace my WiFi cameras and if he a five star review. I‚Äôm so done trying to make these cameras work

title: Seems to work now
text: The last update messed up logging in for users, but today‚Äôs update seems to have fixed it.

title: Please fix the update asap!!
text: It won‚Äôt let me or my husband log in, even after changing the password. We‚Äôve been using this app/cameras for two years with no problems and I use it to keep an eye on my little when he sleeps so I hope the problem is fixed soon!

title: I‚Äôm liking this
text:
These cameras are great for the price, good image quality. The app has icons for controlling lights and thermostat. I contacted Funlux about which parts I need for controlling lights. They said they don‚Äôt sell them anymore. 
Maybe some day, but the cameras work great, and the app does too.

This is crazy and irritatingmi use the cameras for my baby and my dogs. Please fix this...... Please I will update my review of this changes....i hope

title: Latest Update Makes 5 Stars
text: Wow!  Can't stress how much improved the app has become since the latest update.  More user friendly and loads so much quicker.

title: It is very helpful and easy to operate
text:
Great help to keep eye on my elderly mother in law, as she requires lot of monitoring. 
Easy installation and set up.
Great image quality and audio.
Like it very much!
Even on computer app easy to use.

title: Trash
text: The app is trash. You can‚Äôt rewind, and if you select a motion notification it won‚Äôt show the time frame from the clip, it should be daylight and it‚Äôll show you night. If you try to manually rewind it‚Äôll go back much further than you want. The time zones are also off. They seriously need to stop and figure this crap out.

title: Okay for what you pay for
text:
The app works okay but you can‚Äôt group cameras. 4 cameras need to be watched 1 at a time. Configuring the camera mode times can be frustrating. Customer support is about as helpful as a magic 8 ball.  
They promised to fix many issues with their new update in 2020. So I am looking forward to that.

Everything was great until the update. iPhone 6, FYI.

title: App is working fine but Cloud is bad
text:
I've 2 funlux Mini Cam installed and i use Funlux App it was working fine for me every time I click on camera live view . I really like the cameras because it show really clear during daytime but night time is good and wide screen 115 degrees that I ever use , but to view the content on the cloud is very bad , sometimes I can see the recording but a lot of times it took too long to download the videos then an errors pop up says ( no connection) then I view again to the next section and I can see the videos. What is going on. Everyday I try to view the Cloud Videos to make sure they all working before I send the camera back. This Mini  Funlux Cam also worked with Zmodo and Meshare App so now I'm confused to which is the right App for the Mini Funlux Camera. Who's fixing the Cloud 
PLEASE FIX IT OR I WILL RETURN THE CAMERAS BACK .

title: Kills your bandwidth. Make an off button????? Have to cycle modes to turn off.
text:
The concept this app has is great I just wish the App was not so sticky or glitchy. Our internet service is fast but the video feed is always glitchy. 
Also I get notifications even when I have it set to home mode. My understanding is these features are adjustable and I have done so with the same results. 
Another bothersome issue is when we turn off the system the cameras seem to stay on appear to be recording all the time. I am also unsure how secure this app is can others view my cameras easily?
Also Touch ID would be a great addition and add a level of security. Also more device control. I'd like to be able to add a powered door lock and window sensors. 
I'll change my rating as this service improves.

After the last update the app no longer connects to my cameras and nothing I try fixes the issue. I called the App support hotline and even though it said my call was first in line, I waited on hold for over 30 minutes. I eventually gave up. I will wait 7 business days then I'm returning these now non functioning cameras......

Everyone, to fix the app crashing issue, you must delete all your event and motion history. Once my wife and I did this it started working again. The app is still glitchy but I can open and see my cameras now. I have an iPhone 7plus and my wife has a Samsung S7

title: The camera has potential, but the apps doesn't take advantage of it
text:
Recent update of the camera firmware blocked the Port 80 for the built-in camera web pages and options that were there are not longer available in the apps. The apps is to simple and do not take fully advantage of the camera hardware. We need a more customize app so we can take full control of every single piece of hardware of the camera. I cannot longer set the quality of the recordings. Before the firmware upgrade I was able to record in full 720p, right after the update its not longer working, it seem that record in 480p or even less quality as the video and images has a very poor quality (pixeled).

I was happy to buy more cameras but with this updates without letting the consumer knows or at least provide release notes, I am taking a step back on buying more cameras. Not for the hardware but for the software that controls it.

Thanks

title: No problems
text:
I've had the cameras and app for over a month now and I've never had to uninstall/install the app. I really love the cameras I just wish there weren't so many lights on it. I have them in my kids' rooms and the lights are bright for sleeping kids. I put electrical tape over the indicator light but the other light can't be covered up or it won't work. 
Also, if you mount it to the wall the camera doesn't just stay pointing where you put it because the cord pulls it down. So it has to be sitting and it has to have something on the back of it so it doesn't fall forward. Sounds like a nuisance but it's not. I like the quality a lot! And I like that we can set it to alert us of any movement when we aren't home.

title: Great  app
text: In all honesty I have only used the camera for 1 day but I must say I hat with all the negative ratings I saw when I first saw the app, after using it for 1 day I was impressed. There must have been an update because I haven't encountered any crashes (knock on wood) the interface is great. The camera take great pictures and videos and for the price I'm thinking of purchasing three more cameras. If I encounter any difficulties I will update my ratings to reflect my experience.

title: Cameras are great, but the app? Not so much.
text: I'm not one to write app reviews usually, but this one...man. This is by far, one of the buggiest apps I've ever used. I'm logged out at random, and it takes forever to log me back in. Sometimes I can view the cameras live, sometimes they error out. (It's about 50/50 whether they work.) Sometimes I can view the picture/video and delete them from the alerts (when motion or sound is detected), and sometimes I can't. Again, it's about 50/50. I truly am impressed by the cameras, but this software/app really needs some work.

title: Lots of improvements needed.
text:
The app lacks of a lot of improvements. Here are some that the developer needs to consider for customer satisfaction:

1.- Home screen with real time video on all the installed cameras.
2.- Ability to arrange the order of the cameras as the user wants/need.
3.- Share specific camera between family, friend or security personnel.
4.- Share photos/videos taken from the phone/tablet to the people you want.
5.- Share the pictures taken from the alarm/motion sensor to the people that the user wants/need.
6.- Add fast forward, reverse, pause, play to the videos you are reviewing.
7.- Add the ability to watch recorded videos right from the phone/tablet without the need to be in the same wifi network.

I hope the developer understand the importance of these improvements to the actual user and also to future users.

title: Live view
text: I'm assuming that updates took care of most of most of the complaints addressed. One thing I'd like to see in live view is have all 8 cameras on the screen at the same time. And if I select the camera to be on HD view, have it stay in that mode...instead of pressing it anytime I select another camera.

title: Inconsistent and Glitchy
text: Camera works great. We enjoy the layout of the app, but unfortunately it crashes frequently or will not load and states "device is offline." The app is quite inconsistent and often glitches. The camera seems high quality. We wish the app operated with the same consistent quality. Hoping for some better updates and fixes in the future.

title: Horrible
text: I have nothing positive to say about this app. Every time I try to view my camera it takes multiple attempts of logging in and even when I do login it takes another few minutes to load. I even downloaded the newest version in hopes it would improve. Nope have attempted to login 3 times now with a message reading "timeout" every time. I need to allow at least 10 mins every time I would like to view my camera.

title: Crap
text: There should be a no star rating. This app is totally crap. The cameras work great, but the app is something that I'd hand to an enemy. Totally nonfunctional, hardly user friendly, and very difficult to understand. It has only a limited amount of what you're able to do to manipulate your cameras...if it can pick all of them up. I want this app to be totally revamped, and until then, I'll be sure to advise against this costly system with limited user capabilities.

title: Loved this app worked well for awhile
text: I've been using this app with my security camera. It worked great the first  couple weeks and now it won't let me view my live camera on my phone unless I'm connected to wifi. Can you please fix this issue????

title: App crashing
text: Everything was great and then update crashed.  Cameras are useless if the app won't open.  My Grandmother lives with me and this has been the best thing for me check in on her while at work.  Now I can no longer see what is happening at my house while I am away.  Please fix this bug.  I have iPhone 6s v 10.2.1 and everything was great until this "fix" which is more like a break.

title: Useless app
text: I have to uninstall this app & reinstall it every time I want to use app. That defeats the purpose of the camera's. Cameras work great but app has a lot of issues. Since I can't use app with cameras, because of the reinstalling & uninstalling of this app. Love cameras, but app too use cameras is, has way too many problems & now I have to buy different brand of cameras so I can have security in my place. Please fix this app. ASAP!!!!!

Cameras work great. Easy to set up    This app though - gets 1 star. Starts glitching where I have to delete and reinstall the app. That is super annoying. Installed today and already  delete/reinstall app 4 times !!!!!

title: Great security systems
text: Easy to set up. Cameras work great both indoors and out. I receive proper notifications. It does its job. It's worth the investment if you want to see what's going on around your home.

title: Have to keep deleting and restarting app
text:
Completely annoying. Fix the app or I'm returning the cameras and deleting the app for good!!!!
I have it 1 star ONLY because of the app. It would be 5 stars if I didn't have to keep deleting it and restarting the application. Very annoying. Overall I like the 2 way voice and the quality of the cameras. It serves its purpose.

title: No response from tech support
text: As everyone has already stated, the app does not function correctly so you have to constantly delete the app and then re download it. The frustrating part is that when you try to contact them, theres a really long wait for tech support and they do not reply back to your emails.

title: Used to work
text: What happened? This app worked well, I contacted developer when I started having problems and was told to reinstall I have and it has not worked since. With a wifi camera you need the app to function. The other app me share does not have same features as this app.

title: Overall good design-- couples glitches need attention
text:
4-22-17
App is more stable. Still have automatic scheduling issue described below. 

2-23-2017 update:
I thought the update would help with the bugs I initially discussed. NOPE. Now the app crashes after being open about 2 seconds. SAD! ONE STAR!

Previous review: Overall, the design of this app is intuitive and easy to use. The biggest annoyance is that the automatic mode scheduling feature does not work. I set times for the different modes to automatically activate, but it never works, so I am forced to manually change the mode from "home" to "sleep" every night (and change it back to "home" in the morning.) Secondly, trying to access cloud footage from the live stream view causes the app to hang. I am assuming this is because I have not subscribed to the cloud storage, but an error message should appear rather than the app freezing.

title: Stopped working when WiFi password changed
text:
I agree with other users.  What is wrong with your software staff? Do they even test their software before making it available for general use?

Two cameras were working fine for a year but as soon as I upgraded my network (still 2.4GHZ) it stopped working.  Is your new so called software?  Is it a Wong QR code? It is not the device.  So work out the problem.

text:
Got the 3 cam deal on Amazon day. Then saw the bad app reviews. Decided to give it a chance anyways but the app does not allow me to even sign up. When I put my phone number it tells me it's incorrect. Excuse me??!!

Returning them today.

title: MUST NEEDED Improvements
text: As I'm sure most people have done, I bought the products from a lightning deal off Amazon. The app is aesthetic but is hardly functional. The app fails to notify me of when a motion is detected unless I actually go into the all and see/check. In addition the app has crashes in cache or something if you go out of it and return...you literally will have to turn the app off and restart the app in order to regain functionality of it. It also stores the last visual of the room prior to your closing of the app, rather than a preview of the room within a given period of time. There's gonna be a lot of returns of this issue isn't resolved steadfast.
